utilities

Class Rest

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • utilities.Rest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class Rest
extends play.mvc.Controller
    Handles all rest responses, including CORS preflight requests and response serialization.
    Author:
    Bradley Davis

        public static play.mvc.Result options(java.lang.Object path)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        HTTP 200 OK with appropriate CORS headers
